alert.note: Alert for Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 8:23PM CDT until April 27 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Wilkin and Richland Counties. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Wahpeton. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday evening to a crest of 11.0 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
